name: Live Interior 3D Document
summary: Learn about .LI3D files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Live Interior 3D software can export interior views to standard raster formats, such as .JPG, .TIFF, and .PNG.
NOTE: Live Interior 3D was succeeded by Live Home 3D. LI3D files are still supported by Live Home 3D.

description: Interior design project created by Live Interior 3D, a 3D home and interior design program for Mac; saves floor plans, lighting designs, furniture, and other home design information; can be rendered to high-quality and panoramic images.
